Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest
Choice between different Test Pieces (see below Results)
Joan Sutherland Performing Arts Centre (Richard Bonynge Concert Hall), Penrith, New South Wales, Australia TEST SELECTION Bands had the option to select for their Test Selection from a nominated list of 5. Used Pieces: (a) Danzon No.2 (Arturo Marquez trs Oliver Nichel) (b) Symphonic Dance No.3 'Fiesta' (Clifton Williams)
